name: Ecape From Space
description:
Escape from space,

this means to solve room puzzle which are actually like this:
"walk through a door", "throw a ball onto a trigger to open the door - then walk through the door".

Wait, the game will not allow you to solve the puzzles that easy, you need to make use of your superpower: GRAVITY CONTROL

Controls Keyboard: WASD - movement SPACE - jump E - pickup/throw the ball LEFT-SHIFT - zero gravity Controller: XBOX: Left Stick - movement A - jump X - pickup/throw the ball LT - zero gravity Project State

You'll find more details on the actual state of the project in the devlog.
